name: HappyHour
0:
”Alexa, open Happy Hour.”
”How do I make a margarita?”
”What is Snoop Dogg's favorite cocktail?”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: happy hour
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the entire Happy Hour experience from the comfort of your own home with Diageo Happy Hour.

Alexa plays the role of bartender and facilitator of good times. If you're in the mood for a drink, she'll give you drink recipes based on your preferences. If you're in the mood for entertainment, you can raise a glass in celebration with our random cheers generator. To begin, enable the skill and then say: Alexa, Open Happy Hour.
